Package de.mikosninebites.frontend

Class MainWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
de.mikosninebites.frontend.MainWindow
public class MainWindow extends javafx.application.Application
This class represents the main window of the application. It contains the layout and controls for the user interface of the application, including a menu bar, product panels and a shopping cart panel.
Author:
mikolaj korzeniewski (github: bojack2)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws Exception
      Overrides the start method of the Application class and creates the main window of the restaurant application
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage of the application
      Throws:
      Exception - if an exception occurs during the execution of the method

    • createMenuBar

      public void createMenuBar()
      Creates the menu bar and sets its properties, such as button size and padding. Also adds event listeners to the menu bar buttons.

    • createMiddlePanel

      public void createMiddlePanel()
      Creates the central panel of the application, which displays the products available for ordering. Also adds event listeners to the product buttons for selecting favourites.

    • createBottomPanel

      public void createBottomPanel()
      Creates the bottom panel of the main window. The panel contains the company logo, a bill, and two buttons for cancelling or submitting the order.

    • getPayBox

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox getPayBox()
      Returns the pay box containing the bill and cancel button.
